types.section:
{{fr-noun|f}}

# a place, such a section of a [[library]], where [[periodical]]s ([[newspaper]]s, [[magazine]]s, and so on) are archived for consultation
types.html:
hémérothèque f (plural hémérothèques)

  1. a place, such a section of a library, where periodicals (newspapers, magazines, and so on) are archived for consultation
trans: a place, such a section of a library, where periodicals  are archived for consultation
